snippet: Police officers swarmed a Tampa hotel Friday and arrested a man suspected in the killings of four people whose bodies were found stacked on the ground some 45 miles away in Hudson on Thursday.
abstract: Florida police arrest Adam Matos in Tampa hotel in the killings of four people whose bodies were found stacked on the ground some 45 miles away.
lead_paragraph: Police officers swarmed a Tampa hotel Friday and arrested a man suspected in the killings of four people whose bodies were found stacked on the ground some 45 miles away in Hudson on Thursday.

headline.main: Florida: Police Arrest Man Suspected in Killings of 2 Men and 2 Women
headline.print_headline: Florida: Police Arrest Man Suspected in Killings of 2 Men and 2 Women
